content:
Hi,

I hope you're all doing well, I have an issue with my dataverse installation if you could help,
I have installed Dataverse with docker in my server, I also added a custom metadatablock to my installation (with tsv file), everything is working well, however, apparently when I try to go to the advanced search page in the Dataverse interface to search for the data i entered, it gets frozen (the UI freezes ) and the page becomes very slow and irresponsive.

  • for the records I kept the default citation block there (this could be a possible problem because i noticed that the default citation.properties file is very large and has many language and could be the reason why is it slow,
  • additionnaly i noticed some Warning in my logs (Error finding controlledvocabulary.... in defaultLang : Can't find resource for bundle java.util.PropertyResourceBundle, key controlledvocabulary....), not sure if this is related.

Thank you in advance and best regards.
Oussama

@oussama hi! Yes, we did recently add a lot of language in #10762.

Is it also slow for you at https://demo.dataverse.org or https://beta.dataverse.org ?
